title: Part 4 - Highway Traffic Signals
content:
Part 4 - Highway Traffic Signals

State Regulations

Chapter 4A - General (§ 4A.01)

Chapter 4C - Traffic Control Signal Needs Studies (§ 4C.08)

Chapter 4D - Traffic Control Signal Features (§ 4D.05 to 4D.31)

Chapter 4E - Pedestrian Control Features (§ 4E.05)

Chapter 4G - Traffic Control Signals And Hybrid Beacons For Emergency Vehicle Access (§ 4G.01)

Chapter 4L - Flashing Beacons (§ 4L.01 to 4L.04)

Chapter 4M - Lane-use Control Signals (§ 4M.02 to 4M.04)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
